EmailTemplate.name: Global_Event_Data Science Tech Workshops_Q3-416.Reminder - RWE 10-21-16
EmailTemplate.subject: RWE Data Science Technical Workshop Location & Logistics
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://pivotal.io/event/data-science-workshops]]> Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
You are receiving this email because you have been registered for the RWE Pivotal Data Science Technical Workshop, in Essen, on October 24th (8h30 - 13h30).
Here are some important details that you need to know prior to attending the workshop.
Location: RWE IT GmbH Rellinghauser Stra√üe 37 45128 Essen Room: EA11 Map <[[https://www.google.sn/maps/search/RWE+IT+GmbH+Rellinghauser+Stra%C3%9Fe+37+45136+Essen/@51.4604345,7.0097433,14z/data=!3m1!4b1]]>
Your Pivotal Instructor: Sarah Aerni <[[https://www.linkedin.com/in/sarahaerni?authType=NAME_SEARCH&authToken=BK0c&locale=en_US&trk=tyah&trkInfo=clickedVertical%3Amynetwork%2CclickedEntityId%3A41444052%2CauthType%3ANAME_SEARCH%2Cidx%3A1-1-1%2CtarId%3A1476615075472%2Ctas%3Asarah%20aerni]]>
Prepare your system for the workshop: If you are planning to follow the workshop labs, you will need to have a client ssh program installed. There are several open source / free programs available, including:
- Windows: Putty <[[http://www.putty.org/]]> or MobaXterm <[[http://mobaxterm.mobatek.net/download.html]]> (MobaXterm is preferred) - MacOS: Native built in - Linux: Native built in - You are also welcome to use any commercial version you may have
Please contact Marie-Jeanne Dougados at mdougados@pivotal.io <[[mailto:mdougados@pivotal.io]]> for additional questions.
Kind Regards, The Pivotal Team
